snippet: Syrian government and opposition delegations will discuss on Saturday a deal for a short ceasefire to allow humanitarian aid to enter besieged rebel-held areas in Homs, opposition delegate Anas al-Abdah said....

headline.print_headline: Syria Talks to Discuss Ceasefire, Aid Deal for Homs: Opposition
headline.main: Syria Talks to Discuss Ceasefire, Aid Deal for Homs: Opposition

lead_paragraph: Syrian government and opposition delegations will discuss on Saturday a deal for a short ceasefire to allow humanitarian aid to enter besieged rebel-held areas in Homs, opposition delegate Anas al-Abdah said.
